title: El Pavo que se olvidó cómo hacer Glu-Glú (Spanish Edition)
features: Joey el Pavo está triste. Se ha olvidado de cómo hacer glu-glú y necesita la ayuda de sus amigos: el gallo, el perro, la vaca, el gato y el pavo.
Disfruta de las maneras tan graciosas en que cada amigo trata de ayudarlo a hacer glu-glú.
¿Lo lograrán? ¿Volverá Joey a aprender cómo hacer glu-glú de nuevo? ¡Lee y entérate!
The Turkey Who Forgot How To Gobble is an award-winning picture book about Joey the Turkey. Joey has forgotten how to gobble and his barnyard animal friends are there to help.
This childrens book is fun to read aloud and practice animal sounds.
Kids will gobble up this funny animal story about friendship and how friends will always be there to help. Joey's barnyard friends are the Rooster, Dog, Cow, Cat and Gillie the Turkey.
Read and learn how each barnyard animal tries to teach Joey how to gobble.
Are they successful? Does Joey learn how to gobble again?
SCROLL UP AND BUY THE BOOK TO READ AND FIND OUT!
Here's what fans of Joey the Turkey are saying about the book:
It's a great book for Thanksgiving by showing how each farm animal is there to help their friend in need.
What a cute childrens book for 4 year olds! My 4 year old little girl Elsie loves Minnie-moo the Cow. We laugh each time we practice mooing as we read along the story
My kindergarten child loves the colorful picture book of farm animals.
My preschooler boy enjoyed how each animal says goodnight to Joey at the end of the book.
I was pleased to see this book is available in Spanish! We bought this book in English and Spanish for my daughter's kindergarten school library.
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GREAT CHILDRENS BOOKS IN ENGLISH AND SPANISH:

www.TwinkleTwinkleBooks.com
description: Author: Alexis Purcell, yep that's me.
Getting toddlers and young children to sit still and read can be a challenge, I know, I am a parent too!

My children's books help to create an enjoyable read and learn routine using fun stories, colorful illustrations, and cute baby animals. Kids will be ready to read and learn, and have fun while doing it! Fun fact: happy kids = happy parents!!
Try our other books for children, in English and Spanish.
In English and Spanish From The Nighty Night series (ENGLISH):
And for kids who want to read "..just one more book..." here are more to choose from:
THE TURKEY WHO FORGOT HOW TO GOBBLE
EL PAVO QUE SE OLVIDO COMO HACER GLU-GLU
TWINKLE TWINKLE HEAR MY PRAYERS-A Prayer for Peace
